actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to repeal the provisions in the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to the inclusion of social security and certain railroad retirement benefits in gross income to the extent such provisions do not apply to nonresident aliens.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Repeals the provisions of the Internal Revenue Code which include one-half of social security and tier 1 railroad retirement benefits in the gross income of the taxpayer. Provides that one-half of social security benefits paid to nonresident aliens is includible in gross income of the nonresident alien.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the provisions in the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to the inclusion of social security and certain railroad retirement benefits in gross income to the extent such provisions do not apply to nonresident aliens.
